name: WordPress Product XML Feed Manager for WooCommerce缺少授权漏洞
product: ["WordPress Product XML Feed Manager for WooCommerce <=2.9.2"]
description: WordPress和WordPress plugin都是WordPress基金会的产品，WordPress plugin是一个应用插件。WordPress Product XML Feed Manager for WooCommerce存在缺少授权漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致利用配置不当的访问控制安全级别。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://wordpress.org/plugins/product-xml-feeds-for-woocommerce/
patch: WordPress Product XML Feed Manager for WooCommerce缺少授权漏洞的补丁
